abstract: Britain's film certification board gave the go-ahead for Tom Six's shock-horror movie to be shown to viewers 18 and older after 2 minutes 37 seconds of footage were cut from the film.
snippet: Britain's film certification board gave the go-ahead for Tom Six's shock-horror movie to be shown to viewers 18 and older after 2 minutes 37 seconds of footage were cut from the film.

headline.main: Ban on 'Human Centipede 2' Is Lifted in Britain
